text: The s Tennis Masters Challenger was a tennis tournament held in Graz, Austria from 1991 to 2008. The event was part of the ATP Challenger Series and was played on outdoor clay courts. ==Past finals== ===Singles=== {|class="wikitable" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runner-up
